name: XWUI Carousel Component
description: Carousel component for displaying images or content in a sliding container. Supports autoplay, navigation arrows, indicators, and looping. Useful for image galleries and content showcases.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

autoplay.description: Whether the carousel should automatically advance slides

interval.description: Time in milliseconds between autoplay slide changes

loop.description: Whether to loop back to the first slide after the last

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the carousel

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of carousel items to display

id.description: Unique identifier for the carousel item

content.description: Content element or HTML string for the carousel item
